name: Sports Fitness Trainer - Exercises for the body
name_original: Sports Fitness Trainer - Exercises for the body
description:
Learn and try Sports exercises differently.
We present the v1.0 of Sports Fitness Trainer for the users of iPhone & iPad to try out Exercises differenetly. Beginners and professionals can practice these Exercises
* Physiotherapy
* Joint Exercises.
* Stretching
* Strengthening
* Sports Injuries.
* Stretching and much more.
Application is having a beautiful design where a user will just have to tap on the body part and then he/she will get the best exercises.
Then you can compare your performance by recording your video and after watching these videos, you will definitely realize where to improve yourself as an Athlete.
Download and enjoy.
